name: SNONG (PotatoBackflip)
description:
SNONG is the classic Pong with some hectic twists - the product of a quick uni project with the theme of "Weird Input"!

Created in two weeks with my mate for a uni project, with me working on the programming and VFX.

Made in conjunction with

Alex - @MagicMagpieGame on Twitter (2D Artist, 3D Artist, Sound Artist)

Some sounds also sourced from royalty-free sites.
